tool_description: Transcribe And/Or Translate Video Contents to any desired language
name: Video Linguist
title: Video Linguist

api_list.name: read_root__get
api_list.description:
Root endpoint to check the API status.

Returns:
dict: A welcome message indicating the API is functioning.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://video-linguist1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "video-linguist1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://video-linguist1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "video-linguist1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
